div.h1: Welcome to Brazos River Charter School

div.h4: We are inspired. We are respected. We are family.

p.strong: Due to Governor Abbott’s executive order, students will not be returning to the campus for the remainder of the year and will continue with online/remote learning. The 2020 Graduation Ceremony will be rescheduled for the seniors who pass for the year. Stay tuned for up-to-date information.

div.h1: Important Message to Current BRCS Students...

div.h4: Attendance is being recorded each Friday based on a students submission for that week’s work. Not doing work means being counted absent, and you could lose your credit by not submitting work by Friday in any given week.

div.h3: No one from Brazos River Charter School will contact you via email regarding payment while students are currently in online only classrooms.
div.h4: Individuals are attempting to contact parents and guardians with emails impersonating a school official or administrator from Brazos River Charter School. These emails are demanding payment and are known as ransomware.

div.p: Brazos River Charter School employs innovative and comprehensive learning techniques to provide students with an individualized, focus-based education. Serving grades 9-12, Brazos River Charter School offers flexibility and convenience with multiple schedules per day. Scholars are encouraged to participate in morning or afternoon coursework affording them the ability to garner life skills outside of the traditional educational environment. Our motivated and experienced educators employ the latest project-based learning techniques and educational systems to motivate and nurture each scholar to achieve their highest potential.

li.a: Public Notification of Nondiscrimination in Career and Technology Education Programs (Vocational Programs)

div.p: Brazos River Charter School provides students with all the tools necessary to succeed in school and beyond. Check out our Scholar Resources section to find information about our school calendar, class schedule.and more.
Join Brazos River Charter School today! Become one of the newest members of our family and enjoy the excitement and journey with your fellow Explorers!
